title: Watch: BBC News' interview with Elon Musk in full
description: The interview, aired live from Twitter HQ, covered mass layoffs, misinformation and his work habits.

title: Elon Musk says Twitter will change BBC account label to 'publicly funded'
description: The Twitter boss says it will be adjusted from "government funded media" to "publicly-funded".

title: Elon Musk tells BBC that owning Twitter has been quite painful
description: More than three million people logged into the Twitter Space to listen to the interview.
